snippet: World number one Novak Djokovic, who will defend his Paris Masters title next week, says he is fully motivated again having felt mentally drained since his French Open success in June....
lead_paragraph: World number one Novak Djokovic, who will defend his Paris Masters title next week, says he is fully motivated again having felt mentally drained since his French Open success in June.

headline.print_headline: Djokovic Mentally Recharged Ahead of Paris Masters
headline.main: Djokovic Mentally Recharged Ahead of Paris Masters
